turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Need to order coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay that's no problem. It comes with whipped cream is that okay?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so that's a caramel cappuccino with half and half and whipped cream. What size?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I'm seeing a lot of starbucks near you, which one should I place the order with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One on corner of Yellowstone and Alameda.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, one moment while I place your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: SO that's a grande Caramel Cappuccino with whipped cream and half and half to be picked up from the starbucks on Yellowstone and El Camino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, I hope you enjoy it.
